messages.messageBody:
-----Original Message-----
From: kdself@...

Hi all,
Just joined the group today :-)HI KELLY! :-)

-=-=-

Hi, Karen! Welcome!

-=-=-=-=-

Yall all seem to be very forward and outgoing. I am sure I am going
to enjoy the activity of the group, and pick many brains in the
future. LOL

-=-=-=-

We're *certainly* very forward! <g> We're looking forward to being
picked. <bwg>


~Kelly

Kelly Lovejoy
Conference Coordinator
Live and Learn Unschooling Conference
http://www.LiveandLearnConference.org

messages.subject: Newbie here :-)
messages.msgSnippet: Hi all, Just joined the group today :-)HI KELLY! :-) Karen Self from Cottageville, SC here. Homeschooling for 4 years now.3 boys here John(19)graduated 2005
messages.messageBody:
Hi all,
Just joined the group today :-)HI KELLY! :-)

Karen Self from Cottageville, SC here. Homeschooling for 4 years now.3
boys here John(19)graduated 2005 YEEHAAA! Daniel(15) and Matthew(10).

We have begun unschooling in January....ITS HARD TO LET GO!!! but I am
hanging in there.

Yall all seem to be very forward and outgoing. I am sure I am going
to enjoy the activity of the group, and pick many brains in the
future. LOL

I look forward to chatting with you all.

Karen
